name: places/ChIJjzHv06T3wokRexHW_8j3gck
formattedAddress: 351 W 122nd St, New York, NY 10027, USA
adrFormatAddress: 351 W 122nd St, New York, NY 10027-5101, USA

originalText.text:
Our stay at the Castle really felt like staying in the castle! Sid is a wonderful host that always made sure that we had what we needed throughout our stay. Very spacious rooms with various themes to add a little extra flavour! Our room was equipped with a microwave and mini fridge as well.

A slight downside was the bathroom situation since there was work being done in the castle, it limited us to the one shower upstairs, but it wasn’t the end of the world. Especially considering that the work is being done to improve the castle overall.

The location is EXTRAORDINARY! In the heart of Harlem, 3 minute walk to 125th subway station which connects to every main line to go downtown to Manhattan. Lots of food spots around the castle as well and not too far from a big park, 10 min walk to central park approximately so you really couldn’t ask for better.

I was a little skeptical of the beds at first given the thin mattresses but my friend and I both had great sleep! Very cozy room, and spacious.

The castle is a perfect spot to stay in but also to host many events, we noticed lots of big rooms with TVs and speakers perfect for any event. The shower upstairs was nice with good water pressure. Overall, the castle was wonderful and my friend and I very much enjoyed it. We’ll be back to stay with Sid very soon!

originalText.text: This is a perfect location to visit and explore Harlem. I've stayed several times for both personal and professional stays. The rooms are clean, spacious, and extremly reasonably priced for Manhattan. The neighborhood is safe, quiet and inviting. Access to public transportation is all around convenient. If you like shopping, dining, or dancing this is the perfect area. Sydney is an outstanding host. He is extremely intelligent and eager to help if needed. The Castle is a place I highly recommend. I will be back.

originalText.text: They will not stop leaving fliers under the windshield of my car, multiple per week. Then it rains and the flier adheres to the windshield and I need to bring out cleaning materials to get it off. Please find another way to advertise.

text.text: They will not stop leaving fliers under the windshield of my car, multiple per week. Then it rains and the flier adheres to the windshield and I need to bring out cleaning materials to get it off. Please find another way to advertise.

originalText.text: Appropriately named “CASTLE” 351! Don’t miss out on having the experience of staying at Castle 351 which is a historic brownstone in Harlem!! The architectural features of the brownstone were breathtaking, the location unmatched, and the host Sidlocks was super accommodating, and great with communication. If you ever thought about visiting the city and want convenience and a peaceful place to sleep, book here. You won’t regret it! I’ll be back to visit again, next time for restaurant hopping for a taste of Harlem!!

originalText.text:
I loved staying at the beautiful brownstone Castle and the location, a very convenient and safe neighborhood only a few blocks from the main street and right next to a family friendly park. There were nice cafes (including LGBTQ featured ones), restaurants, and vegetarian dinners near the house, and those historical churches in the area seemed to be popular among the tourists from all over the world. The house was a few mins walk to/from 125th Street Station and the A train took me to NY Penn Station in 10-15mins, so I had easy access to mid-lower Manhattan.
The room was spacious, clean and comfortable with a lot of natural light coming in, and I remember the house was very quiet throughout the day because it was located on a residential street. I highly recommend staying at the Castle, it's a beautiful house and you can enjoy the amazing scenery and positive vibes in the center of Harlem.
